Package org.ensor.algorithms.astar.grid

This package contains an implementation of a square and hex map suitable for use in the A-Star algorithm.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GridMap
    This class is an abstract base class which provides functionality common to most 'grid' type maps.
    GridMapCompassMoves
    This class represents a grid map on which a mover is allowed to move in the four cardinal compass directions only.
    GridMapDiagonalMoves
    This class represents a grid map on which a mover is allowed to move in the four cardinal compass directions as well as four diagonal directions.
    GridMover
    This is an entity which can move on a grid.
    GridNode  
    HexMap
    This map implements the semantics of a hexagonal grid for the purpose of graph node traversal.

Package org.ensor.algorithms.astar.grid Description

This package contains an implementation of a square and hex map suitable for use in the A-Star algorithm. The square and hexagonal grid moves are implemented in an extensible manner so that other rules can be additionally applied to the cost calculation as well as the rules which determine adjacency and the ability for a particular mover to pass a particular node. Both the mover and the map node get a bitmap of flags and the mover is allowed to pass the node if "(moverFlags & nodeFlags) != 0"
